channel.title: Comments on: PXS Mail Form, Potential Spam

item.title: By: Christoph
item.dc:creator: Christoph
item.description:
I was using the 1.6 version of that plugin until this night. Same problem. My web hosting provider has still not reactivated my account. Seems I am a bad guy now. I will try Ryan Duff's plugin once I get access to my site again. Google sources say version 1.4.3 is ok.
See http://www.anders.com/projects/sysadmin/formPostHijacking/ for more information about what seems to be going on.
item.content:encoded:
I was using the 1.6 version of that plugin until this night. Same problem. My web hosting provider has still not reactivated my account. Seems I am a bad guy now. I will try Ryan Duff’s plugin once I get access to my site again. Google sources say version 1.4.3 is ok.

See http://www.anders.com/projects/sysadmin/formPostHijacking/
for more information about what seems to be going on.
